mapper.select: SELECT g.G_NO AS g_no, g.G_NAME AS g_name, g.G_IMG_NAME AS g_img_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_GROUP_MEMBER gm WHERE gm.G_NO = g.G_NO) AS memberCount FROM TBL_GROUP g WHERE g.G_NO IN ( SELECT gm.G_NO FROM TBL_GROUP_MEMBER gm WHERE gm.M_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{m_id}) );
